right.text: then i spit on them and left on one of their bikes. my display of deviance has sent ao message to all christian denominations, DONT RIDE BIKES OR ILL KICK YOU

left.text: hey pancake today i saw some mormons riding around on bicycles, so i kicked them over and tore up their pamphlets and told them GOD WASNT REAL and they were SO STUPID

right.text: and i was like FVCK V and i karate chopped her in the chest and she had a stroke. i got a spanking for it but THOSE CHRISTIANS WILL LEARN
